pageSetting.title: 中间业务个人明细查询

attribute.value: select dmz as key, dmms as value from csb_dmms where dmmc='ZJYW'

select.isEqual: select '明细' mx, jxdx.hth as qyh,jxdx.hth as yqyh, jxdx.khh, jxdx.khmc, jxdx.qyrq, jg1.jgdh, jg1.jgmc, hy.hydh, hy.hymc, '百分比:' || f_numtochar (gx.zlbl) as fpgx, jg.jgmc qyjg, jxdx.jyzh, jxdx.cxrq as zxrq, $ywlx$ ywlx from jxdx_sjyhqy jxdx inner join dxgx_yjgx_dzyh gx on gx.hth=jxdx.hth and gx.jxdxlx=$ywlx$ inner join khdx_jg jg on jg.jgdh=jxdx.jgdh inner join khdx_hy hy on hy.khdxdh=gx.khdxdh and gx.khdxdh=$khdxdh$ inner join khdx_jgcy jgcy on jgcy.khdxdh=hy.khdxdh and $tjrq$ between jgcy.qsrq and jgcy.jsrq inner join khdx_jg jg1 on jg1.khdxdh=jgcy.jgkhdxdh where $tjrq$ between gx.qsrq and gx.jsrq

select '明细' mx, jxdx.shdh as qyh, jxdx.shdh as yqyh, jxdx.qyrq, jg1.jgdh, jg1.jgmc, hy.hydh, hy.hymc, '百分比:' || f_numtochar (gx.zlbl) as fpgx, jg.jgmc qyjg, jxdx.jyzh, jxdx.cxrq as zxrq, $ywlx$ ywlx from jxdx_posshdjb jxdx inner join dxgx_yjgx_dzyh gx on gx.hth=jxdx.shdh and gx.jxdxlx=$ywlx$ inner join khdx_jg jg on jg.jgdh=jxdx.jgdh inner join khdx_hy hy on hy.khdxdh=gx.khdxdh and gx.khdxdh=$khdxdh$ inner join khdx_jgcy jgcy on jgcy.khdxdh=hy.khdxdh and $tjrq$ between jgcy.qsrq and jgcy.jsrq inner join khdx_jg jg1 on jg1.khdxdh=jgcy.jgkhdxdh where $tjrq$ between gx.qsrq and gx.jsrq

select '明细' mx, jxdx.hth as qyh, jxdx.hth as yqyh, jxdx.khh, jxdx.khmc, jxdx.qyrq, jg1.jgdh, jg1.jgmc, hy.hydh, hy.hymc, '百分比:' || f_numtochar (gx.zlbl) as fpgx, jg.jgmc qyjg, jxdx.jyzh, jxdx.cxrq as zxrq, $ywlx$ ywlx from jxdx_wyqy jxdx inner join dxgx_yjgx_dzyh gx on gx.hth=jxdx.hth and gx.jxdxlx=$ywlx$ inner join khdx_jg jg on jg.jgdh=jxdx.jgdh inner join khdx_hy hy on hy.khdxdh=gx.khdxdh and gx.khdxdh=$khdxdh$ inner join khdx_jgcy jgcy on jgcy.khdxdh=hy.khdxdh and $tjrq$ between jgcy.qsrq and jgcy.jsrq inner join khdx_jg jg1 on jg1.khdxdh=jgcy.jgkhdxdh where $tjrq$ between gx.qsrq and gx.jsrq

sqlMap.select: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select dmz as key, dmms as value from csb_dmms where dmmc='ZJYW'
